DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial design evaluate efficacy , dose-response safety WIN-901X Asthma patient .
DOC.detailed_description: Double blind , Randomized , Placebo Controlled , Multi-center , Phase 2 : Exploratory Clinical Study Evaluate Efficacy , Dose-response Safety WIN-901X Asthma Patients
DOC.criteria: Greater equal 20 less 80 year age Have physician diagnose asthma irreversible airway obstruction least 6 month prior screen FEV1 60 % 85 % inhale fastacting bronchodilator screen No history smoke least one year prior screen Having voluntarily sign inform consent Have visit emergency room due worsen asthma symptom , within 4 week screen Have hospitalize due acute worsen asthma within 3 month screen Have history laryngitis , pyrexia , sinusitis , otitis medium , respiratory tract infection , infectious rhinitis within 4 week prior screen Have malignant tumor
